languages.text: {n}Джай прикрывает глаза, погружаясь в омут воспоминаний.{/n} "Затем за девочкой пришли слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g} и забрали в Девятнадцатый Ифритский полк, представляешь? Конечно, его смели в первую же вылазку, но девочка выжила — Великий оградил! А что же дальше? Служба в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}, много, просто до жопы много труда. И битв. И сделок... Новых возможностей и мутных связей".

{n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай прикрывает глаза, погружаясь в омут воспоминаний.{/n} "Затем за девочкой пришли слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g} и забрали в Девятнадцатый Ифритский полк, представляешь? И сделок... Новых возможностей и мутных связей".

Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? languages.text: {n}婕伊闭上了眼睛，回忆着过去的岁月。{/n}“在那之后，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的仆人来了，把那个女孩征召到了艾弗里特第十九师团，你能想象得到吗？那支师团第一次作战时就被全歼了，但那个女孩却活了下来！至高无上的神皇保佑了她！接下来呢？她在{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}服役多年，只有没完没了的苦役，还有战斗……还有交易……以及形迹可疑的合作伙伴，还有新的机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊闭上了眼睛，回忆着过去的岁月。{/n}“在那之后，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的仆人来了，把那个女孩征召到了艾弗里特第十九师团，你能想象得到吗？那支师团第一次作战时就被全歼了，但那个女孩却活了下来！至高无上的神皇保佑了她！接下来呢？她在{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}服役多年，只有没完没了的苦役，还有战斗……还有交易……以及形迹可疑的合作伙伴，还有新的机会。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae cierra los ojos, dejando que sus recuerdos la lleven al pasado.{/n} «Después, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Sus{/g} sirvientes llegaron y reclutaron a la niña para el 19.º regimiento de Efreet, ¿se imagina? Por supuesto, el regimiento cayó en su primera expedición, pero la niña sobrevivió. ¡El Exaltado nos protege! Y ¿qué pasó después? Años sirviendo en el {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, sin hacer más que un huevo de trabajo duro. Y combatir. Y cerrar tratos... y conseguir conexiones cuestionables y nuevas oportunidades».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae cierra los ojos, dejando que sus recuerdos la lleven al pasado.{/n} «Después, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Sus{/g} sirvientes llegaron y reclutaron a la niña para el 19.º regimiento de Efreet, ¿se imagina? Por supuesto, el regimiento cayó en su primera expedición, pero la niña sobrevivió. ¡El Exaltado nos protege! Y ¿qué pasó después? Años sirviendo en el {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, sin hacer más que un huevo de trabajo duro. Y combatir. Y cerrar tratos... y conseguir conexiones cuestionables y nuevas oportunidades».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは目を閉じ、何年にも及ぶ思い出を思い返す。{/n}「それから{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}主{/g}のしもべたちがやってきて、少女をイフリート第19連隊に徴兵したわ。もちろん、連隊は最初の出撃で全滅したけれど、少女は生き残った。エグザルテッド・ワンがお守りくださったの！それで、それからどうなった？{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}で何年も奉仕し、ただひたすら過酷な労働を強いられた。そして戦い。そして取引…そして、怪しいコネと新しいチャンスがやってきたの」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは目を閉じ、何年にも及ぶ思い出を思い返す。{/n}「それから{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}主{/g}のしもべたちがやってきて、少女をイフリート第19連隊に徴兵したわ。もちろん、連隊は最初の出撃で全滅したけれど、少女は生き残った。エグザルテッド・ワンがお守りくださったの！それで、それからどうなった？{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}で何年も奉仕し、ただひたすら過酷な労働を強いられた。そして戦い。そして取引…そして、怪しいコネと新しいチャンスがやってきたの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Submergée par les souvenirs, Jae ferme les yeux.{/n} « Ce jour-là, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ses{/g} serviteurs sont venus l'enrôler dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit, vous imaginez un peu ? Évidemment, dès sa première sortie, le régiment a été massacré. Mais la fillette, elle, a survécu. Grâce en soi rendue à l'Exalté ! Et ensuite ? Elle a servi l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} pendant des années. Elle a trimé. Combattu. Et passé des marchés... qui lui ont permis de se faire des contacts et de se créer de nouvelles opportunités. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Submergée par les souvenirs, Jae ferme les yeux.{/n} « Ce jour-là, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ses{/g} serviteurs sont venus l'enrôler dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit, vous imaginez un peu ? Évidemment, dès sa première sortie, le régiment a été massacré. Mais la fillette, elle, a survécu. Grâce en soi rendue à l'Exalté ! Et ensuite ? Elle a servi l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} pendant des années. Elle a trimé. Combattu. Et passé des marchés... qui lui ont permis de se faire des contacts et de se créer de nouvelles opportunités. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schließt die Augen und lässt sich von den Erinnerungen durch die Jahre zurücktransportieren.{/n} "Dann kamen {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}seine{/g} Diener und zogen das Mädchen in das 19. Efreet-Regiment ein, ist das zu glauben? Das Regiment wurde zwar bei seinem ersten Einsatz ausgelöscht, aber das Mädchen überlebte. Der Erhabene beschützt! Und wie ging es dann weiter? Lange Jahre im {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, einfach unfassbar viel harte Arbeit. Und Kämpfe. Und Handel ... Und zwielichtige Verbindungen und neue Gelegenheiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schließt die Augen und lässt sich von den Erinnerungen durch die Jahre zurücktransportieren.{/n} "Dann kamen {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}seine{/g} Diener und zogen das Mädchen in das 19. Efreet-Regiment ein, ist das zu glauben? Das Regiment wurde zwar bei seinem ersten Einsatz ausgelöscht, aber das Mädchen überlebte. Der Erhabene beschützt! Und wie ging es dann weiter? Lange Jahre im {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, einfach unfassbar viel harte Arbeit. Und Kämpfe. Und Handel ... Und zwielichtige Verbindungen und neue Gelegenheiten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then His servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the Astra Militarum, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

languages.text: {n}Jae, gözlerini kapayıp geçmişinden anılara dalıyor.{/n} "Sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O'nun{/g} hizmetkârları gelmiş ve kızı 19. İfrit Alayı'na almış, aklın alıyor mu? Alay elbette ilk görevinde dümdüz edilmiş ancak kız ölmemiş. Görkemli korur! Sonra ne mi olmuş? Yıllar boyunca {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum'da{/g} hizmet, çuval dolusu ağır iş. Bir de savaş. Anlaşmalar. Kanun dışı bağlantılar ve yeni fırsatlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae closes her eyes, letting the memories carry her back through the years.{/n} "Then {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants came and drafted the girl into the 19th Efreet Regiment, can you imagine? Of course, the regiment was wiped out on its first sortie, but the girl survived. The Exalted One protects! So what was next? Years serving in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}, just a shitload of hard labour. And fighting. And deals... And shady connections and new opportunities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gözlerini kapıyor ve yıllar öncesine dair anılara dalıyor.{/n} "Sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O{/g}'nun hizmetkârları gelmiş ve kızı 19. Efreet Alayı'na almış, aklın alıyor mu? Alay elbette ilk görevinde dümdüz edilmiş ancak kız ölmemiş. Görkemli korur! Sonra ne mi olmuş? Yıllar boyunca {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}'da hizmet verme ve çuval dolusu ağır iş. Savaşmak ve de. Anlaşmalar yapmak ve de. Kanun dışı bağlantılar kurmak ve yeni fırsatlar elde etmek ve de."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
